sentences.en: And they must reapply for the awards each semester | semester.
sentences.cn: 并且,他们每学期都必须重新申请奖金.

sentences.en: And they must reapply for the awards each semester.
sentences.cn: 并且每学期都必须重新申请该项奖励.

sentences.en: And they must reply reapply for their words the awards each semester.
sentences.cn: 并且他们每个学期必须重新应用奖金.

sentences.en: I really do need an ID card. May I reapply for a new one?
sentences.cn: 我真的很需要一张身份卡, 我可以再申请一张 吗 ?

sentences.en: If you interrupt this process, you will have to reapply for the Certificate.
sentences.cn: 如果您中断了此过程, 则必须重新申请证书.

sentences.en: Moisturising: Liberally apply lotion to dry or and massage lightly. Reapply several times a day.
sentences.cn: 润肤: 取适量霜于干燥或需要的皮肤上轻轻按摩,一天可重复数次.

sentences.en: Professor Dippet told him that he was too young at eighteen, but invited him to reapply in a few years, if he still wished to teach.
sentences.cn: 迪佩特教授说他才十八岁，太年轻了，但欢迎他过两年再来申请，如果到那时他还想教书的话。

sentences.en: Reapply after swimming or excessive perspiration.
sentences.cn: 游泳或者过度排汗后,请重新使用.

sentences.en: Reapply every few hours, rinsing and drying the skin beforehand.
sentences.cn: 每隔几个小时重复使用, 但要先冲洗并弄干皮肤.

sentences.en: Reapply every two to three hours spent outdoors . Also, use lip balm an SPF rating.
sentences.cn: 隔二到三小时再补擦一次, 同时也别忽略了嘴唇的防晒护理, 应该使用标有SPF的润唇膏.

sentences.en: Students must reapply - apply after a year, if they want to continue off campus an off - campus job.
sentences.cn: 如果学生想要继续 校外 工作必须在一年后重新申请.

sentences.en: Students must reapply re - apply after a year if they want to continue an off - campus job.
sentences.cn: 留学生如果要继续在校园外工作,必须在一年后重新申请.

sentences.en: Students must reapply re - apply after a year if they want to continue an offoff - campus job.
sentences.cn: 如果学生们想继续参加 校外 工作,他们必须在一年后重新申请.

sentences.en: The bird birds even reapply the cosmetic mixture when the colour faded in the sun.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟甚至当阳光使色彩增强时,重新补充这些化妆品混合物.

sentences.en: The new guidelines also mandate that products include directions to reapply regularly and prohibit brands from claiming on their labels that their sunscreens are sweat proof or waterproof.
sentences.cn: 新准则还强制规定，产品要定期进行方向再申请，并禁止在其标签上声称，其防晒霜是防汗或防水的。

sentences.en: To reapply for and review for the case which had have examinationand review or had withdrawn.
sentences.cn: 六对已审定或已撤回之争议案件重行申请审议者.

sentences.en: Your boss the driver's seat, and you will have to reapply for your job every day.
sentences.cn: 你老板现在大权在握而你则要每天重新申请你的工作.
